## Checklist

- [ ] Linked to at least one issue (`Closes #<id>`).
- [ ] I ran the code/tests locally and they passed.
- [ ] I wrote clear commit messages.
- [ ] I reviewed my own diff before requesting review.
- [ ] I understand the code/config I’m submitting (not blindly copy-pasted).
